messages.content: Hey im looking for a samsung smart phone with at least 8gb ram

These Samsung smartphones all have at least 8GB of RAM: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Dual SIM 12GB RAM 256 GB Storage, SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Ultra 256GB AI Smartphone, SAMSUNG Galaxy S24 Dual SIM, SM-S921B/DS Dual Sim EU/UK Model 8GB Ram 256 GB Storage Factory Unlocked AI Smartphone, (Onyx Black), Galaxy S24+ Plus 5g SM-S926B/DS 256GB 12GB RAM, 50 MP Camera, AI Smartphone, Unlocked Android International Model 2024 Cobalt Violet
